title: My Shop is bugged @ Riot

embed.description: Imgur: The most awesome images on the Internet.

body:
2325 Kindred skin, supposed to be 40% off bringing it to 1395.

Yet the store sells it for 1350, making the discount actually a price increase. Same for Arclight Vel'koz and  Ghost Bride Morgana.

Why are my discounts bugged? Can I have a reroll, because this is pretty lousy :(

replies.body: You have 0rp why do you even care

Because everyone has 0 RP until they purchase RP?

Yeeeaaaaa that's actually displaying properly, even though at first glance it looks a little screwy.

That Your Shop price is actually including the price of Kindred since this account doesn't own her. The price of the skin in the shop is the discounted price *of just the skin itself and doesn't include the champion*.

Thank you for responding.

Assuming I am using RP (I know I have to add some I just haven't decided how much yet) I will be able to purchase the champions AND the skin through that menu or do I need to buy the champion first, then purchase the skin through shops?
